sentences.en: An audio - visual display gives visitors an idea of what life was like aboard a sailing ship.
sentences.cn: 视听展览让参观者得以了解在航行中的船上生活是什么样子.

sentences.en: Artists translate their ideas into visual images.
sentences.cn: 画家把自己的思想转换成视觉画面。

sentences.en: At the required level of visual verisimilitude, computer animation is costly.
sentences.cn: 要使电脑动画的视觉效果达到要求的逼真程度，花费会十分昂贵。

sentences.en: He became famous as an inventor of astonishing visual and aural effects.
sentences.cn: 他因发明了神奇的视听效果而出名。

sentences.en: He has a visual impairment in the right eye.
His designs have a strong visual appeal.
sentences.cn: 他的设计在视觉上很有感染力.

sentences.en: I have a very good visual memory.
Most designers share the unspoken belief that fashion is a valid form of visual art.
sentences.cn: 大多数设计者都认同这样一种不言而明的理念，即时尚是视觉艺术的一种重要形式。

sentences.en: Music, mime and strong visual imagery play a strong part in the productions.
sentences.cn: 音乐、哑剧动作和强烈的视觉影像在表演中产生了强烈的效果。

sentences.en: The film is a visual art.

sentences.cn: 这部电影令人震撼的画面

sentences.en: The opera was an aural as well as a visual delight.
sentences.cn: 这部歌剧对于听觉和视觉都是一种享受.

sentences.en: The tall tower adds to the visual impact of the building.
sentences.cn: 高高的塔楼增强了这幢大楼的视觉效果。

sentences.en: They marked out the boundaries of our visual universe.
sentences.cn: 他们标出了我们视觉经验领域的界限。

sentences.en: Visitors are shown an audio-visual presen-tation before touring the cellars.
sentences.cn: 参观酒窖前，游客们先观看了有声的视频介绍。

words.tran_cn: 视力；美景；眼力；幻象；想象力
视觉型的人；观察仪；想像者

phrases.tran_cn: 直观显示；视觉显示；光学显示；可见显示
视觉效果；视觉特效，视觉效应
视觉冲击，视觉震撼；视觉效果
视程；可见区域；可视距离
n. 视觉系统，目视（光学）系统

trans.tran_en: something such as a picture or the part of a film, video etc that you can see, as opposed to the parts that you hear
